aka: アリス とふしぎのくに のべーカリー
愛麗絲的仙境烘焙坊(港/台)

cast.name: 奥德丽·瓦西莱夫斯基 Audrey Wasilewski

trans_title: 爱丽丝的仙境面包店 第二季
アリス とふしぎのくに のべーカリー
愛麗絲的仙境烘焙坊(港
introduction: In the new season, Alice, the great-granddaughter of the original heroine and a budding young baker at the enchanted Wonderland Bakery, goes through the Looking Glass, after finding a magical mirror in the pantry, that transports her to a whimsical chessboard world. On this side of the Looking Glass, anything Alice imagines is possible. With the Silver Queen as their guide, Alice and her friends - Rosa, Hattie, Fergie, and others - meet all sorts of curious characters in this season, including Kyra the Knight, Jacques the Mock Turtle, and Mopsy, the mop dog.Alice's Wonderland Bakery is produced by Disney Television Animation. Emmy Award-nominated Chelsea Beyl (Doc McStuffins) is executive producer, Frank Montagna (Elena of Avalor) is co-executive producer and art director, and Ciara Anderson (Harley Quinn) is producer.
chinese_title: 爱丽丝的仙境面包店 第二季
